GetOwnRequestLog.summary: Queries the log of an API call performed by using the current account based on the returned request ID of the API to troubleshoot issues.
GetOwnRequestLog.description: Permissions on this API cannot be granted to other members.

schema.title:
需要查询日志的requestId。
API 请求的唯一标识符（UUID格式，且必须为大写）。
schema.description: The request ID returned by the API for which you want to query the log. The value is the universally unique identifiers (UUID) of the API request and must be uppercase.

logInfo.title: 包含API请求日志的详细信息。
logInfo.description: The detailed information about the log of the API call.

basicInfo.title: 包含API请求的基本信息。
basicInfo.description: The basic information about the log of the API call.

apiDoc.title: API文档信息。
apiDoc.description: The information about the API documentation.

aliyunSite.title: 中国站文档链接。
aliyunSite.description: The documentation URL on the China site (aliyun.com).

alibabacloudSite.title: 国际站文档链接。
alibabacloudSite.description: The documentation URL on the international site (alibabacloud.com).

productName.title: 产品名称信息，包含中文名和英文名。
productName.description: The product name, which includes the Chinese name and English name.

apiStyle.title: API风格，可能为ROA或RPC风格类型。
apiStyle.description: The API style. Valid values: roa and rpc.

logRequestId.title: 本次查询日志的requestId，并非本次请求的requestId。

httpStatusCode.title: 所查日志内的Http状态码信息。
httpStatusCode.description: The HTTP status code in the log.

errorCode.title: 所查日志内的错误码。如查询的请求并未报错，该字段为空。
errorCode.description: The error code in the log. This parameter is left empty if no error is reported in the API call.

errorMessage.title: 所查日志内的错误消息。如查询的请求并未报错，该字段为空。
errorMessage.description: The error message in the log. This parameter is left empty if no error is reported in the API call.
errorMessage.example: The resource is not in a valid state for the operation.

accessDeniedDetail.title: 无权限报错详细信息
accessDeniedDetail.description: The error message returned if the operator does not have the required permissions.

policyType.title: 无权限的策略类型
policyType.description: The type of the policy that causes the permission-related error.

authPrincipalOwnerId.title: 当前身份所属的阿里云账号UID信息
authPrincipalOwnerId.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account to which the current identity belongs.

authPrincipalType.title: 操作者的身份类型
authPrincipalType.description: The identity type of the operator.

noPermissionType.title: 无权限原因
noPermissionType.description: The cause of the permission-related error.

authAction.title: 导致无权限的具体操作
authAction.description: The operation that the operator does not have permissions to perform.

encodedDiagnosticMessage.title: 用于诊断的编码后信息。可调用 Ram 产品的 DecodeDiagnosticMessage OpenAPI 进一步诊断获得更多诊断信息。
encodedDiagnosticMessage.description: The information after encoding, which can be used for troubleshooting. You can call the DecodeDiagnosticMessage operation of Resource Access Management (RAM) for further diagnostics.

requestDuration.title: 网关从收到请求到返回响应的时间。单位毫秒（ms）。
requestDuration.description: The duration from when the gateway receives the request to when the client receives a response. Unit: milliseconds.

sdkRequestTime.title:
SDK请求时间。
日期格式按照 ISO8601 表示法，并使用 UTC 时间，格式为 yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ
sdkRequestTime.description: The time when the request is initiated. Indicate the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

gatewayProcessTime.title:
网关处理时间。
日期格式按照 ISO8601 表示法，并使用 UTC 时间，格式为 yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ
gatewayProcessTime.description: The time when the gateway receives the request. Indicate the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

endpoint.title: 服务区域对应的服务地址（Endpoint）。
endpoint.description: The endpoint of the service region.

throttlingResult.title: 流控校验结果。FC.PASS：未被流控检查拦截；FC.DENY：被流控检查拦截。
throttlingResult.description: The throttling result. Valid values: FC.PASS: The task is not blocked by throttling. FC.DENY: The task is blocked by throttling.

callerType.title:
调用者类型。
1. customer：云账号；
2. sub：RAM子用户；
3. AssumedRoleUser：STS Token临时身份；
callerType.description:
The type of the caller. Valid values:

1.  customer: an Alibaba Cloud account
2.  sub: a RAM user
3.  AssumedRoleUser: a user that uses a temporary Security Token Service (STS) token

callerIp.title: 调用者的IP地址
callerIp.description: The IP address of the caller.

masterAccountId.title: 主账号ID
masterAccountId.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account.

callerAccountId.title: 调用者账号ID
callerAccountId.description: The account ID of the caller.

userAgent.title: 用户代理信息
userAgent.description: The information about the user agent.

signatureMethod.title:
签名方法。
 * HMAC-SHA1: 使用HMAC-SHA1算法进行签名
 * HMAC-SHA256: 使用HMAC-SHA256算法进行签名
signatureMethod.description:
The signature algorithm. Valid values:

*   HMAC-SHA1
*   HMAC-SHA256

authenticationType.title:
认证类型。
 * AK: 包括永久AK、临时AK、STS TOKEN等。
 * PRIVATEKEY：一种非对称加密类型的AK。
 * BEARERTOKEN：一种身份验证机制，广泛应用于 OAuth 2.0 框架和云服务中。
 * CUSTOM_SPI：一种高效且安全的认证方式，适用于云市场中 SaaS 类商品的交付和管理。
 * Anonymous：匿名访问。
 * DPS：类似于AK，但是签名算法不同于阿里云官方，个别产品专属。
authenticationType.description:
The authentication type. Valid values:

*   AK: includes a permanent AccessKey pair, a temporary AccessKey pair, and a STS token.
*   PRIVATEKEY: an AccessKey pair for an asymmetric cryptography algorithm.
*   BEARETOKEN: an authentication mechanism that is widely used in the OAuth 2.0 framework and cloud services.
*   CUSTOM_SPI: an efficient and secure authentication method that is suitable for the delivery and management of Software as a Service (SaaS) services in Alibaba Cloud Marketplace.
*   Anonymous: anonymous access.
*   DPS: an authentication method that is similar to AK. Its signature algorithm is different from that of Alibaba Cloud services and is exclusive to specific products.

parameters.title: 请求参数信息。
parameters.description: The information about the request parameters.

name.title: 请求参数名。
name.description: The name of the request parameter.

value.title: 请求参数值。
value.description: The value of the request parameter.

required.title: 该请求参数是否必填。
required.description: Indicates whether the request parameter is required.

type.title: 该请求参数类型。
type.description: The type of the request parameter.

responses.title: 对应该请求的返回信息。
responses.description: The information that is returned for the request.

responseBodyFormat.title:
响应体类型。
JSON、XML、HTML。
responseBodyFormat.description: The type of the response body. Valid values: JSON, XML, and HTML.

requestId.title: 本次请求ID，与logRequestId非同一个参数。

400.errorMessage: Please ensure that the request ID you provided originates from a request you made to a certain OpenAPI.

404.errorMessage: The log related to this logRequestId does not exist, has expired, or you do not have permission to view it.

GetOwnRequestLog.title: GetOwnRequestLog

GetErrorCodeSolutions.summary: Queries an error solution by error code.
GetErrorCodeSolutions.description: You can call this API operation to query public information instead of special information, such as the account ownership. Permissions on this API operation cannot be granted to other members.

schema.title:
发生错误时收到的错误码Code。
以如下报错信息为例，请传入NoPermission作为errorCode参数值：
"Code": "NoPermission",
"Message": "You are not authorized to perform this action.",
"AccessDeniedDetail": {***},
"Recommend": "https://api.aliyun.com/troubleshoot?q=NoPermission&product=***&requestId=***",
"RequestId": "***",
"HostId": "***.aliyuncs.com"
schema.description: The error code based on which you want to query a solution.

schema.title:
收到报错的错误信息Message字段。

Code与Message为一个完整的二元组，匹配诊断方案首先以errorCode必填参数匹配，返回匹配同一Code下的所有诊断解决方案（solutions）。如传入errorMessage参数，则通过errorCode+errorMessage作为一个独立的二元组匹配对应解决方案。

以如下错误消息为例，传入NoPermission作为errorCode参数值，传入You are not authorized to perform this action作为errorMessage参数值：
"Code": "NoPermission",
"Message": "You are not authorized to perform this action.",
"AccessDeniedDetail": {***},
"Recommend": "https://api.aliyun.com/troubleshoot?q=NoPermission&product=***&requestId=***",
"RequestId": "***",
"HostId": "***.aliyuncs.com"
schema.description: The error message for which you want to query a solution. This parameter must be configured together with the errorCode parameter.
schema.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

schema.title:
筛选特定产品。

当errorCode匹配到solutions存在于多个产品下时，通过product参数指定特定的产品solution。如指定的产品的code没有solution，则会抛出报错，详见错误码列表。
schema.description:
The product code. You can use one of the following methods to query a product code:

*   Call the GetRequestLog operation to query a product code from the response.
*   Query the code of a product in the OpenAPI Explorer URL of the product. For example, the OpenAPI Explorer URL of Short Message Service (SMS) is https://api.alibabacloud.com/product/Dysmsapi. Therefore, the product code of SMS is Dysmsapi.

schema.title: 限定solutions的语言，目前支持中文（zh-CN）与英文（en-US），并非所有solutions具备英文内容。
schema.description: The language of the solution. Valid values: zh-CN and en-US. Not all of the solutions are available in English. If you set this parameter to en-US, but the corresponding solution is actually not available in English, no response is returned.

solutions.title:
解决方案列表，并非每个报错都具备诊断方案，如有需求可以通过提交工单或者通过API门户反馈给我们。
每个元素包含以下属性：
solutions.description: The solutions. Not all error codes have corresponding solutions. You can submit a ticket or use OpenAPI Explorer to contact technical support if necessary.

content.title: **解决方案内容**：主要内容，统一以markdown格式返回。一般可能包含“标题”、“触发条件”、“解决步骤”等段落信息。
content.description: The content of the solution, which is in the markdown format.

solutionId.title: 本次查询的解决方案的唯一 ID。

product.title: 本次查询的错误码所属的产品code。
product.description: The code of the product to which the solution belongs.

productName.title: 本条错误码所属的产品名称，为OpenAPI门户所显示的产品名称。
productName.description: The name of the product to which the solution belongs.

errorCode.title: 本次查询的解决方案对应的错误码。

errorMessage.title: 本次查询的解决方案对应的错误消息。
errorMessage.example: The resource is not in a valid state for the operation.

400.errorMessage: Accepted language should only be zh-CN or en-US.
The errorCode should be a string and cannot be empty.
The errorMessage should be a string or null.
The product should be a string or null.

404.errorMessage: The provided product does not exist.

GetErrorCodeSolutions.title: GetErrorCodeSolutions

GetRequestLog.summary: Queries the log of an API call based on the returned request ID of the API to troubleshoot issues.
GetRequestLog.description: You can grant permissions to a Resource Access Management (RAM) user or assume a role to query the log of an API call across RAM users or Alibaba Cloud accounts. For more information, see [Grant permissions to troubleshoot API errors across accounts](~~2868101~~).

schema.title:
需要查询日志的requestId。
API 请求的唯一标识符（UUID格式，且必须为大写）。
schema.description: The request ID returned by the API for which you want to query the log. The value is the universally unique identifiers (UUID) of the API request and must be uppercase.

errorMessage.example: The resource is not in a valid state for the operation.

accessDeniedDetail.description: The error message returned if the operator does not have the required permissions. This parameter is available only if an authentication error is reported for the request ID.

httpMethod.title: Http请求方式。
httpMethod.description: The HTTP request method. Valid values: GET, PUT, and POST.

requestDuration.description: The duration from when the gateway receives the request to when the client receives a response. Unit: milliseconds.

endpoint.description: The endpoint of the service region.

1. customer：云账号；
2. sub：RAM子用户；

callerAccountId.description: The account ID of the caller.

userAgent.description: The information about the user agent.

signatureMethod.title:
签名方法。
 * HMAC-SHA1: 使用HMAC-SHA1算法进行签名
 * HMAC-SHA256: 使用HMAC-SHA256算法进行签名
signatureMethod.description:
The signature algorithm. Valid values:

*   HMAC-SHA1
*   HMAC-SHA256

authenticationType.title:
认证类型。
 * AK: 包括永久AK、临时AK、STS TOKEN等。
 * PRIVATEKEY：一种非对称加密类型的AK。
 * BEARERTOKEN：一种身份验证机制，广泛应用于 OAuth 2.0 框架和云服务中。
 * CUSTOM_SPI：一种高效且安全的认证方式，适用于云市场中 SaaS 类商品的交付和管理。
 * Anonymous：匿名访问。
 * DPS：类似于AK，但是签名算法不同于阿里云官方，个别产品专属。
authenticationType.description:
The authentication type. Valid values:

*   AK: includes a permanent AccessKey pair, a temporary AccessKey pair, and a STS token.
*   PRIVATEKEY: an AccessKey pair for an asymmetric cryptography algorithm.
*   BEARETOKEN: an authentication mechanism that is widely used in the OAuth 2.0 framework and cloud services.
*   CUSTOM_SPI: an efficient and secure authentication method that is suitable for the delivery and management of Software as a Service (SaaS) services in Alibaba Cloud Marketplace.
*   Anonymous: anonymous access.
*   DPS: an authentication method that is similar to AK. Its signature algorithm is different from that of Alibaba Cloud services and is exclusive to specific products.
